or you can use any ol- radio that has am and fm  bands and just manually sweep- that is mostly what ive been doing with some great results ( couldnt get a radio to hack) but turns out you really dont have to have one
  Charm

Zack Widup <w9sz@...> wrote:
          
Hi Matt,

You can get a Radio Shack 12-469 for $25 and hack it to do the scanning.

Zack
